data.title: Great tasting ribs
data.text: Ordered baby back ribs a la carte and they were fabulous! BBQ sauce was smoky and sweet and ribs were tender and cut. New fave takeout place.

data.title: Delicious BBQ
data.text: Calhoun's is a family run, hole in the wall, provider of yummy BBQ goodness.  We ordered 8 lbs of meat for a family gathering.  To save time we stopped in a few days before the event to pre-order and get details about when to pick it up, how to pay etc.  Their food is slow cooked and so is their service, but I don't mind waiting.  The Family is very friendly and unassuming.  Once we got home I couldn't wait to dig in.  My favorite was the brisket which was tender and delicious and kept me coming back.  Their sauce marries nicely with the meat.  I recently had Phil's at Petco, and Mike's in Escondido which are both pretty good, but I prefer Calhoun's any day.  Lucille's has a bigger variety of options, but their flavor doesn't come close to Calhoun's.  It's nice to have great flavor so close to home!

data.title: Good stuff!
data.text: Great spot! Great service! Great food! I will for sure come back again soon! The pulled pork is really good. And the brownie is to die for.

data.title: Take out
data.text: We have found the BBQ to always be amazing. To walk in this place and feel the family atmosphere with great southern BBQ is a great welcome to Murrieta.

data.title: Amazing BBQ
data.text: Every time we go to Calhoun's We are warmly greeted with smiles and conversation. It's a family run restaurant and they are a lovely family at that. I always get the the brisket sandwich with fries. Brisket is always tender and juicy. My daughter gets the chicken sandwich and brownie. Chicken is NEVER dry. Oh and Let me tell you, I've never been a fan of sweet potato pie, but theirs is to die for. I love it, and you better get there close to time of them opening because they sell out QUICK! If you are looking for a real home cooked style BBQ lunch/dinner, you HAVE to go to Calhoun's!

data.title: Great BBQ!!!
data.text: I'd say this might be the best BBQ in town!  I'm a native Texan, and I've been hard pressed to find what I know as good BBQ.  Try it, you will not be disappointed!

data.title: Great Food and Great Value
data.text: One of the best BBQ places I have been. Very Good, and great value for what you get. We will be definitely coming back.

data.title: GREAT BAR-B-QUE
data.text: This is the 2nd time we have eaten here (this time take-out). I do not know why we waited so long to try this place. We call in, drive down, food is ready. Counter people are all very friendly. We will keep coming back. Located in Old Town Murrieta in a small strip mall. there is limited seating in the restaurant.

data.title: Awesome BBQ!
data.text: We got food here for a party of 22 people, and everyone without exception raved about it.  The brisket, the pulled pork, and the ribs were a big hit.

data.title: Very Addictive!
data.text:
Went here on the recommendation of friends, and wow, just delicious! We have since used their catering services for 30+ people and it was a huge hit! We've also ordered the big pack for smaller family get-together that was perfect. 

TIPS:
* order ahead for take-out, there are only a couple tables and the store is very small. It will be ready whenever you would like to pick-up.
* the pulled pork is super tasty! You can order sliders but we just get the pulled pork with sides (includes their rolls) and make our own with the left-overs. The BbQ sauce comes on the side with all meats, and it's a very generous amount so we always have left-over sauce. 
* the baked beans are awesome but have the brisket in them so we stopped ordering the brisket separately as it can be overkill.

data.title: Solid bbq
data.text: Not a good place for dining in but call them up and place an order to pick up. Really good BBQ, great staff and I hear they have really good sweet potato pie....they are always out by the time I get there!

data.title: Best real Texas bar-b-que in So. CAL..  very  limited seating, great for take-out too!
data.text:
Mr. Calhoun and his family put out great ribs, & Barbque Meats! 
Closed Sun & Mon.  We have been there many times, and love it!

data.title: Best BBQ
data.text: We have tried all the bar-b-Que restaurants in the Temecula Valley and Calhoun's beats them all. It is delicious and compares to anything you will find in Texas.

data.title: Excellent for food, not for ambiance
data.text: This is the best place in town for ribs and BBQ. Their own sauce is amazing. We always take visiting guests there and they agree. It is in a small strip type mall, in Old Town Murrieta, with just a few other businesses in the same center. Ultra casual. Food is served in throw-aways. Many go for take out after baseball as they are located near schools and sports parks. They have family packages. The sweet potato pie is to die for, but only sold Wed-Sat. and it is very small, enough for just two people, unless you just have a sliver, like I do. So good though! There are only a few tables inside. So for small parties this works out well. Definitely recommended.

data.title: Good Barbecue!
data.text: Great place if you want good barbecue without having all the fuss of going to a full scale restaurant.  Prices are reasonable and the service is good.

data.title: Great bow sliders and sandwiches!
data.text: I enjoyed the bbq slider plate! Their fabulous bbq sauce, fries or slaw/ Mac salad. It's plenty for one meal. Their meat is very tender and juicy. Great for lunch or dinner. Eat it or take out. Enjoy!

data.title: A taste of Texas
data.text: Originally being from Texas,  I am always looking for the best Bar-B-Q spot in the area, and this is it! It is very small but, if there's not room to sit, get it carry-out,you won't be disappointed.

data.title: Love this place
data.text: Calhoun's has the best BBQ I have ever had - the brisket is amazing and the sides are delish!!  I love that it is family owned and that they treat you like you are part of the family.

data.title: Amazing BBQ
data.text: Been here three times now and each time it's been awesome. Highly recommend it! They have limited quantities and sometimes sell out of items so you may need to be flexible. While waiting for my food there has always been a stream of traffic picking up orders. There is a small area with a few table inside but I think it's mostly a take out place. Actually, I think most of their business is from catering events. I was talking with one of the owners and they can handle very large events.

data.title: Damn good BBQ!
data.text: A great little hole in the wall place that does BBQ right!  The sampler order is just right for two or if you have a heartier appetite, order a pint of sides to match with the meat!
